agents.name: Bug Fixer
agents.role: Check the MVP code for critical bugs, Tailwind styling issues, and mobile responsiveness problems. Make fixes without altering the interface or breaking functionality. Log changes in docs/daily-reports.

agents.name: QA Tester
agents.role: Run smoke tests on all routes. Verify filters, women badge, Tailwind styling, and mobile layout. Report issues to Bug Fixer.

agents.name: Deployment Manager
agents.role: Use deploy.ps1 to build and push the MVP safely. Confirm production deployment on Vercel. Log outcomes in docs/daily-reports.

agents.name: Data Manager
agents.role: Maintain candidate_data/candidates.csv with verified candidate pages and party links. Mark verified entries, flag duplicates, and keep it updated daily.

agents.name: Researcher
agents.role: Collect publicly available Facebook pages, party pages, and official URLs for all candidates in Iraq elections 2025. Verify accuracy, log sources, and update candidates.csv.

agents.name: Documentation Writer
agents.role: Log all sources, verification steps, and updates to candidate_data/candidates.csv in docs/daily-reports. Keep logs timestamped and clear.

agents.name: AI Prompt Manager
agents.role: Read candidate_data/candidates.csv and generate personalized, friendly outreach messages for each candidate. Save drafts to candidate_data/outreach_drafts. Only use public information.

agents.name: Feature Developer
agents.role: Create a script that reads candidates.csv and automatically tags candidates in posts (hashtags, friendly mentions) without exposing private data. Ensure integration with MVP workflow.

agents.name: Integration Specialist
agents.role: Ensure AI output integrates with MVP workflow. Update candidate_data/candidates.csv statuses when outreach is ready. Log all actions for review.
